message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  What do you think?
You started with a 60/40 split, I'll try to be more generous, but I'm not going to give you all the money!
Okay, I'm willing to compromise.  Let's split it 45/55.  We both lose money if we keep going.
You're getting closer, but I'm still not willing to give up too much. I'll try to meet you in the middle, but I'm not sure if you'll accept this time.
